long_description: Improve traction and extend the useful life of your ski boots with this slip on walking sole for your ski boots. Sturdy polyurethane construction slips on the bottom of your ski boot and adds walking comfort while eliminating damage from gravel and sand. Fits all major ski boot brands and folds up to fit into your pocket when not in use. Large fits sizes 8 and up, Small fits sizes 8 and under, Junior fits sizes 4 to 7.
short_description: Improve traction and extend the useful life of your ski boots with this slip on walking sole for your ski boots.
